description: This file defines a utility class 'UtilityAccountMapper' responsible for converting between 'UtilityAccount' Data Transfer Objects (DTO) and 'UtilityAccountEntity' entities within the finance project. It uses Spring's BeanUtils for property copying and extends a generic 'BaseMapper'.

classes.name: UtilityAccountMapper
classes.description: A mapper class for converting between UtilityAccount DTO and UtilityAccountEntity entity.

methods.name: convertToEntity
methods.description: Converts a UtilityAccount DTO into a UtilityAccountEntity object, copying properties if the DTO is not null.

methods.name: convertToDto
methods.description: Converts a UtilityAccountEntity into a UtilityAccount DTO, copying properties if the entity is not null.
